values.value: The 'Create Ticket' feature simplifies the ticket-making process. When utilizing this tool, it will prompt you for essential details such as ticket number, name, and field, ensuring a comprehensive ticket setup. In addition to the basics, you have the option to include additional information like start date, end date, priority, progress, color and a brief description. This user-friendly interface not only makes ticket creation mandatory but also offers flexibility for users to input additional data, providing a more detailed snapshot of the task at hand.
